definition: apparatus used to communicate, usually in Morse code, at a distance over a wire, send cables, wires, or telegrams
details:
noun
- apparatus used to communicate, usually in Morse code, at a distance over a wire
= example: apparatus used to communicate, usually in Morse code, at a distance over a wire
= synonyms: telegraphy
verb
- send cables, wires, or telegrams
= synonyms: cable
